title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 - Pamplona, Navarra, Spain
description:
Global Day of Coderetreat 2016, hosted by Openbravo. We are looking forward to get together with passionate developers to spend a day having fun working on the fundamentals of software development and design. 
Registration is required, you can do itÂ here (https://www.eventbrite.es/e/entradas-coderetreat-2016-pair-programming-tdd-y-buenas-practicas-de-desarrollo-27976679000?aff=ehomecard). If you have any doubt about the event please send an email to coderetreat@openbravo.com
